name: 米利都的泰勒斯
bio_short: 古希腊米利都学派的创始人，被亚里士多德誉为“第一位哲学家”。他试图用自然原因（而非神话）来解释世界，并提出“水”是万物的本原。
bio_short_en: An ancient Greek philosopher from Miletus, recognized by Aristotle as the 'first philosopher'. He sought natural (non-mythological) explanations for the world and proposed that 'water' was the fundamental principle (Arche).
